t: Tim Detweiler | Corporate Creativity & Community | ArtsFund
s: November 17, 2021 - ... Expressions is an art program for Amazon employees that includes workshops taught by teaching artists, drop-in art activities, open studio time for projects of all sorts, and an artist in residence program where local artists can mingle with employees in a casual open studio atmosphere.
